summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest (East Side), from West Graham Street to a connection with the existing concrete walk, 102 feet, more or less, north of West Findlay Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12779 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
